name: TurnKey Solutions
overview:
TurnKey Solutions is the leading provider of intelligent, automated application testing solutions since 1992. Partnered exclusively with HP, the leader in automated testing platforms, TurnKey offers a full range of products for the testing of in-house-developed and packaged applications, as well as for ERP/CRM systems such as SAP, Oracle E-Business Suite, PeopleSoft, Siebel, Salesforce, and more.

TurnKeyâ€™s cFactoryâ„¢ test case creation platform works with the HP stack to allow non-technical users to both create and maintain fully automated functional tests without recording, programming or scripting. cFactoryâ„¢ does this by utilizing the latest generation of application-aware technology to create automated test components directly through its own analysis of application forms and screens. In addition, all cFactoryâ„¢ tests include our exclusive dataDriverâ„¢ technology, which allows for the testing data itself to precisely determine the flow of each test. This not only enables non-technical functional experts and testers, it also allows for test automation to be created and maintained several times faster than is possible with traditional testing tools.

TurnKeyâ€™s Acceleratorâ„¢ platforms provide out-of-the-box, automated testing environments for the major ERP and CRM packages, such as SAP, Oracle E-Business Suite, PeopleSoft, Siebel, JD Edwards, Hyperion, Salesforce, and more. Acceleratorsâ„¢, built on the cFactoryâ„¢ platform, include comprehensive pre-built automated test case libraries, enabling organizations to quickly adopt and deploy effective cross-platform testing and end to end business process validation.
